input_args.text: 'Top5darkests 0 \nThroughout our history and our media, Cemeteries and graveyards have been the classic venue to bring on the scariest environment settings. Nearly everyone can slightly agree some cemeteries can possibly seem to be a little creepy, but when looking into our history, what about the scariest cemeteries in the world? would you be able to handle walking into them? In this video, we cover the most haunted and scariest cemeteries in the world. Enjoy. Tags'
